remarks: Property of a disjoint collection: if ` B ( x ) = C ` and ` B ( Y ) = D ` , and ` x =/= Y ` , then ` B ` and ` C ` are disjoint. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Dec-2016.)
